title: Crafting
content:
his charm to receive all benefits from the Enhance Ability Spell until Long Rest: Bear's Endurance, Bull's Strength, Cat's Grace, Eagle's Splendour, Fox's Cunning, and Owl's Wisdom. Despitre the rotting smell wafting off this talismanm, holding it makes you feel inexplicably powerful. TBA Butterflies in the Stomach Ingredients TBA Deals 1d6 piercing damage A traditional brew of ergot and nutmeg, meat to recapture the fluttering thrill of fist love. TBA
